• First

Content Pages

Meta

  1. Name the file in this format: <4 digit year>-<2 digit month>-<2 digit day>-<ti-tle>.md
  2. Set the front matter starting at first line: 
      ---
  layout: <type that matches a type.html in _layouts>
  title: <my-title>
  categories: [section, or, whatnot]
  tags: [tags, to, associate, for, filters]
  etc...
  ---

Content

  1. Add your content below the front-matter ```md

This is my really cool content, YAY! ```

  1. Make sure the layout has a `` tag!
